question: Welcome back to tumblr! I look forward to reading your ideas once more and will patiently await what your new guidelines will be.
answer:

As if now I don’t have a schedule, I think I’ll post them whenever I finish them? For now that is ^-^

blog.name: kiribaku-some-cute-stuff
blog.title: Kiribaku is the cutest shit I've ever seen
blog.description: A Side Blog!! My Reg Rando Garbage Blog is Moonwolfhowl Pronouns: She/Her and if you'd like Dude. I use Dude, and my Guy as Gender Neutrals. I think I have since highschool? 20s. Birthday: June 5th! Exactly 5 days from All Might's! See guys! Geminis aren't all bad ; __ ; Your girl here needs you to know that she’s immature AF and swears a lot. So if you see the occasional nsfw-ish joke, don’t be surprised lol but anything purely nsfw will be tagged as such. If you want other stuff tagged lemme know. I do want to say this, if you consider yourself an anti or an anti-anti I would prefer you to not follow me. I think you guys are two sides of the same coin and I just don’t want to see my stuff on the blogs of cyber bullies or trolls.

summary: For the ask meme, number 3 & Sero 💞
question: For the ask meme, number 3 & Sero 💞
answer:
Sorry I’m doing this from mobile sooo here we go!

Sero is best boy and has never done anything wrong in his life

Seroroki is godtier but I also like inatodosero, momosero, todomomosero, serokendou, serowase and a couple of others

WHOOPS FORGOT FAV NON ROMANTIC RELATIONSHIPS: I love his dynamic and relationship with the bakusquad ^___^

I don’t have a negative opinion on canon Sero. There are a couple of meh things on fanon but like I love the boy. He’s best boy

GIVE THE BOY HIS OWN ARC

Fav friendship would probably be his and Bakugou’s or his and Kirishima’s

OMG KELL MARESH AND SERO AHAHAHAHA

blog.name: bnha-hcs-fanfics-blog
blog.title: Headcanons, Fanfics, and more!
blog.description: I used to be BNHA-HCS-BLOG before it got deleted! 22 She/Her pronouns. REQUESTS: OPEN

title: REQUEST RULES/GUIDELINES
body:
HEADCANONS:

*You can request up to 4 characters. 

*please note the more characters the less time I will spend on each one.

*Fluffy, Angst, Relationship requests are welcome!

*OC’s are welcome, just give me a good description!

*NSFW requests will be posted with a link to my Ko-Fi account. It won't be filled unless it’s through there.

FANFICTION:

*Please limit to 2 mandatory characters.

*These will take longer than headcanons, please be patient.

*Fluff, angst, relationship requests are welcome!

*Please give as many details as you can so I can accurately fill your request!

*NSFW requests will be posted with a link to my Ko-Fi account. It won’t be filled unless it’s trough there.

GENERAL:

*LGBTQ is welcome!

*All ships are welcome!

*All canon characters are welcome!

*OC’s are welcome!

*All characters will be aged up unless the request clearly states they are in HS.

*Canon x Canon, Canon x OC, Canon x Reader are all welcome!

*Requests are done at my discretion. If you want to make sure your request gets filled go to my Ko-Fi. 


If you have any questions feel free to ask! Thank you all for supporting me and I look forward to filling your requests once again!

summary: So, I’m working on a Nana Shimura cosplay! The clothes are not quite finished yet, so I didn’t use them, but the wig finally...
body:
So, I’m working on a Nana Shimura cosplay! The clothes are not quite finished yet, so I didn’t use them, but the wig finally arrived so I decided to try different kinds of make up to see what looked better for her.

Annnnnnd I still don’t know. I’m just a mortal trying to imitate a Goddess. So, to anyone seeing this… help, please?

(Yes, I know I don’t have muscles, but I’m already training, I promise!)

blog.name: starfluffs
blog.title: 🌺🌺
blog.description:
Hello! This is a Multi-fandom writings blog!

This is also Primarily A male Reader Blog!

Requests: Open

body:
Bakugou Katsuki Crushing HC’s

  • So, when Bakugou first met you, he kinda noticed how he felt bad after telling you to ‘fuck off’
  • But the fact that you stayed around next to him made him wonder why
  • You were constantly nice to him, and you stuck around him despite him always yelling at other people
  • Bakugou doesn’t exactly know what he’s supposed to do with you and he’s out here like “wtf am I gonna do now”
  • One time you were sick, and had to stay in the Dorms/Your Home and he wasn’t having it bc he enjoyed being around you (he would NEVER admit that though)
  • Midoriya asked him what was wrong and nearly got blasted out the window
  • Despite how he acts towards people, he actually gives you genuine smiles and doesn’t tell you to ‘piss off’ of all those other things he deters people with
  • You two are great friends, and soon after he realizes his crush for you
  • When Kirishima and Kaminari notice that they tease him about it till they’re being hunted by a Blushing Bakugou
  • Now though, he’s honestly wanting to confess, but doesn’t know how you feel
  • You feel the same but you haven’t made any moves
  • Though he overheard you talking to Tsuyu about your feelings for him, he doesn’t fess up about it but you do notice that he’s been more blushy around you lately

Bonus:

  • If He, confesses first, you can expect him to be super embarrassed and nervous, which you can see through his reddened face and how he starts getting slightly louder. Which causes you to laugh and he’s just all like “SHUT UP” but despite that, he got through it and you happily accept, but you still tease him, very much so to his demise
  • If You, Confess first, you don’t exactly get embarrassed about it, not yet at least, you kinda just yell at him even though you quietly asked him to come out of the class and talk to you after the bell rang. A loud “I LIKE YOU PLEASE BE MY BOYFRIEND” can be heard. NOW, is your time to become embarrassed and you attempt to run off, but Bakugou accepts with a HUGE smile on his face, and teases you for how embarrassed you got Kaminari got a picture of the smile on his face and probably nearly got killed for that

  • If You, Confess first, you don’t exactly get embarrassed about it, not yet at least, you kinda just yell at him even though you quietly asked him to come out of the class and talk to you after the bell rang. A loud “I LIKE YOU PLEASE BE MY BOYFRIEND” can be heard. NOW, is your time to become embarrassed and you attempt to run off, but Bakugou accepts with a HUGE smile on his face, and teases you for how embarrassed you got Kaminari got a picture of the smile on his face and probably nearly got killed for that
